original_text: When all the inhabitants of Jabesh Gilead heard what the Philistines had done to Saul,
korean_text: 길르앗야베스 모든 사람이 블레셋 사람들이 사울에게 행한 모든 일을 듣고

sentences.original_text: When all the inhabitants of Jabesh Gilead heard
sentences.korean_translation: 야베스 길르앗의 모든 거민들이 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: what the Philistines had done to Saul
